joker-filesys
=============

recent changes
--------------

### version 0.1.3
- add `utils.spread_by_prefix` and `utils.random_hex`

### version 0.1.2
- python_requires >= 3.6
- change `ContentAddressedStorage.hash_algo` default value to `sha256`
- add `ContentAddressedStorage._iter_{paths,cids}`
- naming: key => cid 

### version 0.1.1
- add `ContentAddressedStorage`
